name: Robots And Zombies
description:
Rebello Games' entry for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022.

5 hand crafted levels of pure dungeon crawler fun.

Battle against robots and zombies in a bid to retrieve intel from a moon base that has gone offline in mysterious circumstances.

Controls

Use WASD to move and QE to rotate. 
SPACE to use weapons.
Right Mouse button to Free Look
Mouse Wheel or TAB to change Weapons
ENTER to speed up HUD messages

Enjoy!
